## Mixture model

```{r}
df <- vzv_be_2001_2003[vzv_be_2001_2003$age < 40.5,]
data <- df$VZVmIUml[order(df$age)]
model <- mixture_model(antibody_level = data)
model$info
```

```{r}
plot(model)
```
